widget.name: Card with 3 measures
widget.description: Card with 3 KPIs, white backgorund. Useful to compare 3 different quantities or a single quantity variation over time.

widget.name: LeatherBoard Red
widget.description: Leaderboard with Red Background. This widget supports a leaderboard with maximum 5 elements. You can provide a quantity, a measure and a custom title. Please be aware that the quantitties should already be sorted accordingly.

widget.name: Rose Chart Blue
widget.description: Rose Chart Blue

widget.name: Pair Comparisons
widget.description: Re-arrange entities split by an attribute sorted by one dimension

widget.name: Table Light
widget.description: Responsive table without a fixed number of rows but with restricted to 3 columns.

widget.name: Gauge Metric
widget.description: Also known as a speedometer chart or a dial chart, a gauge chart is one of the most commonly used visual tools to represent progressive values.

widget.name: Trend Comulative Run
widget.description: Trend Cumulative Value

widget.name: Chart Vertical Bar with Trendline
widget.description: Chart Vertical Bar with Trendline

widget.name: Bar Chart with custom icons
widget.description: Horizontal Bar Chart with custom icons, displayed on the y-axis. Bars are colored in blue.

widget.name: Soccer Target Chart (front)
widget.description: Soccer goal from Front perspective. Typically used to show penalties/goals attempts.

widget.name: Soccer Field Chart (top)
widget.description: Soccer goal from above perspective. Typically used to show key moments or actions happended during the football match.

widget.name: Radar Chart Normalized
widget.description: Classical radar chart with axis normalized.

widget.name: Sankey
widget.description: Sankey diagrams emphasize the major transfers or flows within a system. They help locate the most important contributions to a flow. Number of layers is fixes to 4

widget.name: Chart with 6 KPIs
widget.description: Yellow card with 6 slots dedicated to your stats to show. Could be used to highlight the difference w.r.t. to a fixed time frame.

widget.name: Card blue with 6 KPIs
widget.description: Blue card with 6 slots dedicated to your stats to show. Could be used to highlight the difference w.r.t. to a fixed time frame.

widget.name: Treemap
widget.description: A treemap chart provides a hierarchical view of your data and makes it easy to spot patterns, such as which items are a store's best sellers.

widget.name: Funnel
widget.description: A funnel chart is a specialized chart type that demonstrates the flow of users through a business or sales process.

widget.name: Multiple Barchart
widget.description: Horizontal barchart with multiple rows. Each line is separated from the others by a label

widget.name: Barchart With Gradient
widget.description: This horizontal barplot provides several information inside one graph. The length provides the value, the color the improvement/declination of the value w.r.t. to the total value (shown as a black vertical bar)

widget.name: Scatter with regression line
widget.description: 4 different Scatter plots with regression lines.
